Welcome to the Test Cases Page for the UFS weather model¶

Release

ufs-v1.0

Compsets

GFSv16beta, GFSv15p2

Date

Jul 17, 2020

Case Catalogue

  • 2019 Hurricane Barry

  • 2019 Halloween Storm

  • 2017 Denver Inversion

  • 2020 Janurary Cold Bias

This documentation provides resources for representative case studies in the Unified Forecast System Weather model.

Noteable Links¶

  • Developmental Testbed Center (DTC)

  • Unified Forecast System (UFS)

  • The UFS Medium-Range Weather App Users Guide
